API description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

API method.API method description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

API method parameters.name: key
API method parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint
